By his work, the converted, consecrated canvasser is sowing the seeds of truth. This work must be done without delay; for we have but a short time in which to work. Everything that can be done to reach the people must be done. Speak to them in a way that will win their confidence. Pray for the sick. Ask 


                                   -105- 

the Lord to restore and heal suffering humanity. He has declared, "These signs shall follow them that believe."
